com.att.research.xacml.std.pip.engines.jdbc

Class JDBCEngine

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.att.research.xacml.std.pip.engines.StdConfigurableEngine
      • com.att.research.xacml.std.pip.engines.jdbc.JDBCEngine
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    PIPEngine, ConfigurableEngine
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    HyperCSVEngine

    public class JDBCEngine
extends StdConfigurableEngine
    PIPEgineJDBC extends StdConfigurableEngine to implement a PIP that retrieves XACML attributes from a database using JDBC. This is a minimal implementation that does not do any caching of results. It does not perform JDBC connection pooling either.
    Version:
    $Revision$
    Author:
    Christopher A. Rath

    • Method Detail

      • getAttributes

        public PIPResponse getAttributes(PIPRequest pipRequest,
                        PIPFinder pipFinder)
                          throws PIPException
        Description copied from interface: PIPEngine
        Retrieves Attributes that match the given PIPRequest. The PIPResponse may contain multiple Attributes and they do not need to match the PIPRequest. In this way, a PIPEngine may compute multiple related Attributes at once.
        Parameters:
        pipRequest - the PIPRequest defining which Attributes should be retrieved
        pipFinder - the PIPFinder to use for retrieving supporting attribute values
        Returns:
        a com.att.research.xacml.pip.PIPResponse with the results of the request
        Throws:
        PIPException - if there is an error retrieving the Attributes.

      • configure

        public void configure(java.lang.String id,
             java.util.Properties properties)
               throws PIPException
        Description copied from interface: ConfigurableEngine
        Configures this ConfigurableEngine from the given Properties.
        Specified by:
        configure in interface ConfigurableEngine
        Overrides:
        configure in class StdConfigurableEngine
        Parameters:
        id - the String name for this ConfigurableEngine used also to locate properties
        properties - the Properties containing the configuration parameters for this ConfigurableEngine
        Throws:
        PIPException - if there is an error configuring the ConfigurableEngine
